title: Eleanor Roosevelt National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       May 2016 - October 31, 2016 - Open 7 days a week from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.  Guided tours offered throughout the day with the last tour at 4:00 PM. November 2016 - April 30, 2017 - Guided tours only offered at 1:00 pm and 3:00 pm Thursday through Monday.  The visitor center opens at 12:30 PM.  Closed Tuesday and Wednesday. *Reservations cannot be made for Val-Kill November - April* Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day. The grounds are open daily, year round from Sunrise to Sunset.    Â     Val-Kill Cottage NPS
